tsup.description: Run a build on the project using tsup configuration

tsup-neutral.description: Runs a neutral platform TypeScript build

tsup-node.description: Runs a node platform TypeScript build

tsup-browser.description: Runs a browser platform TypeScript build

typia.description: Run the Typia generator to create runtime type validators

npm-publish.description: Publish a package to the NPM registry

cargo-publish.description: Publish a Rust crate to the crates.io registry

rolldown.description: An executor used by Storm Software to run the Rolldown build process

unbuild.description: Run an unbuild build process on a selected project

clean-package.description: Remove configuration files, fields, and scripts for development before publishing package

size-limit.description: Run a size-limit performance test on the project
